content: st on the needle step 3 insert needle purlwise through first st on back needle then drop this stitch off the needle step 4 insert needle knitwise through second st on back needle leaving the st on the needle from this point to the end repeat steps 1-4 grafting requires concentration but a rhythm will inserting needle emerge purlwise front needle knitwise drop off purlwise leave on back needle purlwise drop off knitwise leave on repeat at the end of the row there is only 1 stitch left on each needle work steps 1 and 3 once more use a needle tip or the blunt needle to carefully tighten up the new row of stitches you have created then weave in your ends and enjoy your socks rye socks - worsted facebook-square instagram ravelry pinterest envelope www tincanknits com 5 tin can knits popular patterns ♥ excellent support sign up for our emails and be sure to send us a note about what you d like to learn next facebook-square instagram ravelry pinterest envelope www tincanknits com
